selected_quotes: Long-term research rocks! Fire and climatic extremes shape mammal distributions in a fire-prone landscape.
Hot off the press! Fire, flood, drought mammals.
And it's out! Fire climatic extremes shape mammal distributions in a fire-prone landscape htt…
Climate change won't have much of an impact on wildlife? We beg to differ. Reduced rain + more fires = tough times.
Boom-Bust response of small mammals to fire climate. Climate change will be a disaster!

citation.title: Fire and climatic extremes shape mammal distributions in a fire‐prone landscape

news.title: EcoCheck: the Grampians are struggling with drought and deluge
news.summary: Our EcoCheck series takes the pulse of some of Australia’s most important ecosystems to find out if they’re in good health or on the wane.
